package.name: velodyne_utils
package.description:
ROS tools and utilities metapackage for Velodyne 3D LIDARs.
This package is deprecated. Catkin stacks should never use it, but rosbuild stacks depending on velodyne_utils will still work in Hydro.
In Indigo, all references must use velodyne_height_map directly.
package.author: Jack O'Quin

export.deprecated: This metapackage will be removed in ROS Indigo. Instead, use the velodyne_height_map package directly.
